title: Equitas Small Finance Bank revises interest rates on savings account, FDs - Economic Times
content: Equitas Small Finance Bank revises interest rates on savings account, FDs  Economic Times
description: Equitas Small Finance Bank has revised its savings account and fixed deposit interest rates, effective March 21, 2022. Customers can now earn 7% p.a. on Savings Account balances above Rs 5 lakhs up to Rs 2 crores.
